Best Air Fryers 2026

Curated picks for the best air fryers of 2026, ranked by value, ease of use, and everyday fit. Air fryers have become a staple in modern kitchens, offering a healthier alternative to traditional frying methods while delivering deliciously crispy results. Whether you’re a busy professional, a parent juggling family meals, or a student living in a compact space, there’s an air fryer that fits your needs. In this guide, we’ll explore the top air fryers available this year, helping you make an informed decision.

Overview

Air fryers utilize hot air circulation to cook food, resulting in a crispy texture without the need for excessive oil. This cooking method not only reduces fat content but also enhances the flavor of your favorite dishes. With various models on the market, it’s essential to consider factors such as capacity, cooking functions, and ease of use when selecting the right air fryer for your kitchen.

How We Evaluated

In our evaluation process, we focused on several key criteria to determine the best air fryers of 2026:

  • Performance: How well does the air fryer cook food? We looked for models that deliver even cooking and crisp results.
  • Ease of Use: User-friendly controls and straightforward operation were essential for our top picks.
  • Capacity: We considered the size of the cooking basket and how well it accommodates different household sizes.
  • Value: We assessed the price point relative to the features and performance offered by each model.
  • Customer Feedback: Ratings and reviews from users provided insight into the long-term satisfaction and reliability of each air fryer.

How to Choose

When selecting an air fryer, consider the following factors to ensure you choose the best model for your needs:

  • Capacity: Determine how much food you typically cook at once. Larger families may need a model with a bigger basket.
  • Cooking Functions: Look for models that offer multiple cooking options, such as baking, roasting, and reheating, to maximize versatility.
  • Ease of Cleaning: Choose an air fryer with a non-stick basket and dishwasher-safe components for hassle-free maintenance.
  • Size and Storage: Consider the space available in your kitchen. Compact models are ideal for small kitchens or apartments.
  • Price: Set a budget and compare features within that range to find the best value for your investment.

FAQ

What is an air fryer?

An air fryer is a kitchen appliance that cooks food by circulating hot air around it, creating a crispy outer layer similar to frying but with significantly less oil.

Are air fryers healthy?

Yes, air fryers are considered a healthier cooking option compared to traditional frying methods, as they require less oil, resulting in lower fat content in the food.

Can I cook frozen food in an air fryer?

Absolutely! Air fryers are great for cooking frozen foods quickly and evenly, making them a convenient option for busy households.

How do I clean my air fryer?

Most air fryer baskets are dishwasher safe, but you can also clean them with warm soapy water. Be sure to follow the manufacturer's instructions for proper care.

Can I bake in an air fryer?

Yes, many air fryers come with baking functions, allowing you to bake items like cakes and muffins. Check the specific model for its capabilities.
